key_finding: LinkedIn most blocked (90 requests), GitHub API access blocked (92 requests total) - workflows need GitHub MCP server configuration. Denial rate trending upward from 26.3% to 29.7%.
critical_action: Configure GitHub MCP server for Copilot engine workflows to enable GitHub API access. Review package registry blocking (npmjs.org, pypi.org).
notes: Report generated for December 28, 2025. Analysis based on cached data from December 27 analysis due to MCP server unavailability. Python visualization libraries unavailable - comprehensive text-based analysis provided with detailed tables.

positive: LinkedIn blocking prevents data scraping (90 requests blocked)
concerns: GitHub API blocking affects legitimate workflows (92 total blocks)
Package registry blocking may affect validation (24 total blocks)

immediate: Configure GitHub MCP server for Copilot workflows
Set up alerting for denial rates >30%
long_term: Optimize firewall rules with category-based allow-lists
Document required domains per workflow type
Install Python visualization libraries for trend charts
